column3: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult experienced domestic abuse in last year
column4: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has ever experienced domestic abuse
column5: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has moderate or higher mental ill-health symptoms
column6: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has severe mental ill-health symptoms
column7: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult reports any substance misuse
column8: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has an alcohol or drug dependency
column9: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has any of the 'toxic trio' issues (broad measures)
column10: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has any of the 'toxic trio' issues (narrow measures)
column11: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has 2 of 3 'toxic trio' issues (broad measures)
column12: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has 2 of 3 'toxic trio' issues (narrow measures)
column13: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has 2 or more of the toxic trio issues (broad measures)
column14: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has 2 or more of the toxic trio issues (narrow measures)
column15: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has all 3 of the 'toxic trio' issues (broad measures)
column16: Projected number of 0-15 yr olds in a household where an adult has all 3 of the 'toxic trio' issues (narrow measures)
